Symbol.Script_UI:
dim stTextUIStrings[] stTextUIStrings[1] = `Показ Значения Длины` stTextUIStrings[2] = `Цвет Пера` stTextUIStrings[3] = `Тип Шрифта` stTextUIStrings[4] = `Размер Шрифта` stTextUIStrings[5] = `Размер Шрифта (мм)` stTextUIStrings[6] = `Размер Шрифта (пт)` stTextUIStrings[7] = `Стиль Шрифта` stTextUIStrings[8] = `Жирный Шрифт` stTextUIStrings[9] = `Курсивный Шрифт` stTextUIStrings[10] = `Подчеркнутый Шрифт` stTextUIStrings[11] = `Расположение по X` stTextUIStrings[12] = `Расположение по Y` stTextUIStrings[13] = `Ориентация в Символе`
x1 = 0 x2 = 170 x3 = 267 x4 = x2 + 100 x5 = x2 + 200 !200 (Style Guide => fillTypeInfLenght) xEnd = 444
outfieldHeight = 15 infieldHeight = 19 penInfieldLenght = 33
dy = 24 yEnd = 266 yCurrent = pageStartY + 1
ui_style 0, 1
ui_infield{3} "gs_text_show", x1, yCurrent - 4, x2 - x1 - 2, infieldHeight, 7, "", 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, "", stTextUIStrings[1], 0, "", stTextUIStrings[1], 1
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_style 0, 0
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[3], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield "fontType", x2, yCurrent - 4, x5 - x2, infieldHeight
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[4], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight if bMetricDimension then ui_infield "gs_text_font_size_mm", x2, yCurrent - 4, x3 - x2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_text_font_size_pt", x2, yCurrent - 4, x3 - x2, infieldHeight endif
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[7], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_bold", x2, yCurrent - 4, 20, 20, 6, "", 2, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, "ui_bold_flat(1)", "", 0, "ui_bold_flat(1)", "", 1\ ui_tooltip `Жирный`
ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_italic", x2 + 25, yCurrent - 4, 20, 20, 6, "", 2, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, "ui_italic_flat(1)", "", 0, "ui_italic_flat(1)", "", 1\ ui_tooltip `Курсив`
ui_infield{3} "gs_text_style_underline", x2+50, yCurrent - 4, 20, 20, 6, "", 2, 1, 16, 16, 16, 16, "ui_underline_flat(1)", "", 0, "ui_underline_flat(1)", "", 1\ ui_tooltip `Подчеркнутый`
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[2], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield "gs_text_font_pen", x2, yCurrent - 4, penInfieldLenght , infieldHeight
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[13], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield "typeTextRotation", x2, yCurrent - 4, x5 - x2, infieldHeight
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[11], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield "gs_text_pos_x", x2, yCurrent - 4, x3 - x2, infieldHeight
yCurrent = yCurrent + dy
ui_outfield stTextUIStrings[12], x1, yCurrent, x2 - 2, outfieldHeight ui_infield "gs_text_pos_y", x2, yCurrent - 4, x3 - x2, infieldHeight
! ================================================================================ end ! ================================================================================
